column1: Visit 'https://finance.yahoo.com', 'https://www.marketwatch.com', and 'https://www.cnbc.com'. For each site, extract the current stock price for Apple (AAPL), Microsoft (MSFT), and Tesla (TSLA). If any stock price has changed by more than 3% compared to the opening price (found on the same page), report the stock symbol, current price, percentage change, and the website where the change was detected. Format the report as: '[Stock Symbol]: [Current Price] USD, [Percentage Change]%, detected on [Website]'.

Go to 'https://www.amazon.com'. Search for 'wireless earbuds' and extract the name, price, and availability of the first product in the search results. Report the details for each site in the format: '[Website]: [Product Name], [Price] USD, [Availability Status]'.

Visit 'https://www.bbc.com/news'. Extract the headlines of the top 5 articles listed on the homepage. For each headline, summarize it in 10 words or less. Save the summaries in a list format: '1. [Summary 1], 2. [Summary 2], ..., 5. [Summary 5]'.

Go to 'https://www.booking.com' and 'https://www.expedia.com'. On each site, search for a hotel in Paris for check-in on [tomorrow's date] and check-out on [day after tomorrow's date]. Extract the name and price of the cheapest available hotel from each site. Report: 'Cheapest hotel on [Website]: [Hotel Name], [Price] EUR'.

Visit 'https://www.fedex.com', 'https://www.ups.com', and 'https://www.dhl.com'. For each site, enter the tracking number '1234567890' and extract the current status of the package. Report the status from each site in the format: '[Courier]: [Status]'.
